decisions.question: Which packaging approach for agent support?
decisions.decision: Option C - Hybrid (Claude Skill + Gemini Conductor + Shared Scripts)
decisions.rationale: Supports both Claude and Gemini with shared source-of-truth scripts

decisions.question: Which MCP SSH server package to use?
decisions.rationale: Enhanced SSH is an SSH server (wrong architecture). ssh-mcp is SSH client, correct for connecting to Proxmox.

decisions.question: How to handle interactive prompts in non-TTY SSH automation?
decisions.rationale: Level 1 (non-interactive flags) for 95% of cases, Level 2 (smart wrappers) for cross-distro, Level 3 (TMUX) for complex workflows. Keeps simple operations simple while providing escape hatch.
